name: Alea
description: Basically, you are in control of an Eight-ball that gets thrown on different platforms and needs to achieve a certain goal. Now, the platforms are consisted of smaller dice blocks, each dice block has a certain value of numbers on it and a certain color.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Dual core 3.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: HD 5670 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Dual core 3.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: RX 550, GTX 1030 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
